assets.description: PUNDIAI is an ERC-20 utility and governance token of Pundi AI ecosystem, including Pundi AI Data Platform, Pundi AI Marketplace, Pundi AIFX Omni Layer and Pundi MM AI Agent Launcher.
assets.extended_description: PundiAI is the token rebrand of Function X (FX token) to align with the project's evolving AI and data-driven focus, updating tokenomics to reflect current value, enhancing market perception, improving user adoption, and possibly supporting technical or ecosystem improvements.
assets.name: Pundi AI
